FAQs

Who was Robert Mitchum?

Robert Mitchum was an American actor, born on 06 August, 1917 in Bridgeport, Connecticut, United States.

When did Robert Mitchum pass away?

Robert Mitchum passed away on July 1, 1997.

What was the cause of death?

The cause of Robert Mitchum’s death was Lung Cancer.

How old was Robert Mitchum at the time of death?

Robert Mitchum was 27 years old when he passed away.

How tall was Robert Mitchum?

Robert Mitchum was 6 feet 0 inches (1.85 m).
